Verses: 1 vallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththar Vasaniththu, Sooriyan Udhikkun Thisaithodangi Adhu Asthamikkun Thisaivaraikkumulla Boomiyaik Kooppidugiraar.
2 pooranavadivulla Seeyonilirundhu Dhevan Piragaasikkiraar.
3 nammudaiya Dhevan Varuvaar, Mavunamaayiraar; Avarukkumun Akkini Patchikkum; Avaraich Sutrilum Magaa Pusal Kondhalippaayirukkum.
4 avar Thammudaiya Janaththai Niyaayandheerkka Uyara Irukkum Vaanangalaiyum Boomiyaiyum Kooppiduvaar.
5 baliyinaale Ennode Udanpadikkai Pannina Ennudaiya Parisuththavaangalai Ennidaththil Koottungal Enbaar.
6 vaanangal Avarudaiya Needhiyai Arivikkum; Dhevane Niyaayaadhipadhi. (selaa.)
7 en Janame, Kel, Naan Pesuven; Isravele, Unakku Virodhamaaich Saatchiyiduven; Naane Dhevan, Un Dhevanaayirukkiren.
8 un Baligalinimiththam Unnaik Kadindhukollen; Un Dhaganabaligal Eppodhum Enakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu.
9 un Veettilirundhu Kaalaigalaiyum, Un Thozhuvangalilirundhu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Naan Vaangikkolvadhillai.
10 sagala Kaattujeevangalum, Parvadhangalil Aayiramaayiramaaith Thirigira Mirugangalum Ennudaiyavaigal.
11 malaigalilulla Paravaigalaiyellaam Ariven; Veliyil Nadamaadugiravaigalellaam Ennudaiyavaigal.
12 naan Pasiyaayirundhaal Unakkuch Sollen; Boomiyum Adhin Niraivum Ennudaiyavaigale.
13 naan Erudhugalin Maamsam Pusiththu, Aattukkadaakkalin Raththam Kudippeno?
14 nee Dhevanukku Sthoththirabaliyittu, Unnadhamaanavarukku Un Poruththanaigalaich Seluththi;
15 aabaththukkaalaththil Ennai Nokkik Kooppidu; Naan Unnai Viduvippen, Nee Ennai Magimaippaduththuvaai.
16 dhevan Thunmaarkkanai Nokki: Nee En Piramaanangalai Eduththuraikkavum, En Udanpadikkaiyai Un Vaayinaal Sollavum, Unakku Enna Niyaayamundu.
17 sitchaiyai Nee Pagaiththu, En Vaarththaigalai Unakkup Pinnaaga Erindhupodugiraai.
18 nee Thirudanaik Kaanumbodhu Avanodu Orumiththuppogiraai; Vibasaararodum Unakkup Pangundu.
19 un Vaayaip Pollaappukkuth Thirakkiraai, Un Naavu Sarpanaiyaip (vanjanaiyai) Pinaikkiradhu.
20 nee Utkaarndhu Un Sagodharanukku Virodhamaaip Pesi, Un Thaayin Maganukku Avadhooru Undaakkugiraai.
21 ivaigalai Nee Seyyumbodhu Naan Mavunamaayirundhen, Unnaippol Naanum Iruppen Endru Ninaivukondaai; Aanaalum Naan Unnaik Kadindhukondu, Avaigalai Un Kangalukku Munbaaga Ovvondraaga Niruththuven.
22 dhevanai Marakkiravargale, Idhaich Sindhiththukkollungal; Illaavittaal Naan Ungalaip Peerippoduven, Oruvarum Ungalai Viduvippadhillai.
23 sthoththira Baliyidugiravan Ennai Magimaippaduththugiraan; Than Vazhiyaich Sevvaippaduththugiravanukku Dhevanudaiya Ratchippai Velippaduththuven Endru Sollugiraar.
